1.0.name: wordpress/gravityforms-es
1.0.description:
This plugin requires the Gravity Forms plugin. Don't use Gravity Forms? Buy the plugin and start using this revolutionary plugin!

The Gravity Forms developers don't focus on translating their plugin. Instead they concentrate on the core functionalities of the plugin itself. Therefore there are regular updates of the Gravity Forms plugin. However, after each automatic update, the manually placed Spanish translations are deleted. This plugin fixes that issue for all the Spanish WordPress and Gravity Forms users!
